entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:17 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.4°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
